theater

Class Theater

  • java.lang.Object
    • theater.Theater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadResolveable<Theater>, Loadable, Resetable, Savable

    public class Theater
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReadResolveable<Theater>, Loadable, Savable, Resetable
    Represents a theater that shows plays performed by clients to customers.
    Author:
    Joshua Zierman [py1422xs@metrostate.edu]
